title: The Stock Market Has a Big Day on Jan. 29. Here's What Investors Should Know.
text: The S&P 500 (^GSPC 0.92%) is widely considered the best gauge for the overall U.S. stock market. The index surged 23% in 2024 as investors reacted to the strong economy and excitement about artificial intelligence, and it has already advanced another 2% in 2025 for similar reasons.

title: Microsoft and OpenAI investigate suspected data breach by group linked to China's DeepSeek: report
text: The artificial intelligence (AI) sector is increasingly becoming a battleground for intellectual property disputes, with OpenAI and Microsoft now probing possible unauthorised access to OpenAI's technology. The investigation, reported by Bloomberg, focuses on whether data was extracted from OpenAI's application programming interface (API) by a group linked to Chinese startup DeepSeek.

title: DeepSeek: Microsoft and OpenAI Investigate Group Linked to China AI Startup
text: Microsoft and OpenAI are investigating whether data output from OpenAI's technology was obtained in an unauthorized manner by a group linked to Chinese artificial intelligence startup DeepSeek, according to people familiar with the matter. Bloomberg Intelligence analyst Robert Lea has more.

title: Microsoft probing if DeepSeek-linked group improperly obtained OpenAI data, Bloomberg News reports
text: Microsoft and OpenAI are investigating whether data output from OpenAI's technology was obtained in an unauthorized manner by a group linked to Chinese artificial intelligence startup DeepSeek, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday.

title: What Analysts Think of Microsoft Stock Ahead of Earnings
text: Microsoft (MSFT) is set to report fiscal second-quarter earnings after the market closes Wednesday, with analysts largely bullish ahead of the results.

title: Microsoft Earnings: Is DeepSeek a Threat?
text: It's already been an action-packed week in the market, with news surrounding DeepSeek spooking many investors in the beloved AI trade. And this week's reporting docket will be sure to keep the story alive, particularly when considering we'll hear from OpenAI partner Microsoft MSFT.

title: DeepSeek defense: Microsoft earnings will offer new chance to detail AI capital spending plans
text: Reporting quarterly earnings Wednesday afternoon, it will be tough for Microsoft to avoid the issue of the AI breakthroughs from China's DeepSeek that are shaking up the tech world and the stock market this week.

title: TSLA, MSFT & META Earnings on Deck & Credit "Priced for Perfection"
text: Three of the Mag 7 report earnings after hours on Wednesday. @CharlesSchwab's Nathan Peterson says A.I.

title: DeepSeek validates Microsoft's approach to AI - analyst
text: Microsoft Corp (NASDAQ:MSFT) was one of the very few large-cap tech firms that was spared from the DeepSeek rout, but this "felt about right", according to UBS, but the 14% fall for Oracle Corp (NYSE:ORCL, ETR:ORC) "felt excessive".  The emergence of a potentially more efficient method for training artificial intelligence models "validates much of what Microsoft has been saying/doing of late", analysts at the Swiss bank said.

title: Microsoft earnings results will take a back seat to burning DeepSeek questions
text: Microsoft will report fiscal second-quarter earnings on Wednesday afternoon.

title: Sam Altman touts OpenAI-Microsoft alliance, says next phase will be 'better than anyone is ready for'
text: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman posted a picture of himself with Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella on Tuesday and suggested their relationship is going well. Altman wrote that the "next phase" of their partnership is "gonna be much better than anyone is ready for!

title: DeepSeek: Microsoft's Massive Value Catalyst
text: DeepSeek's open-source models will aid Microsoft Corporation and OpenAI in optimizing cheaper, smarter AI, presenting a massive value opportunity for Microsoft investors. The $5-6 million training cost of DeepSeek-V3 is misleading and doesn't reflect the true development costs, which are significantly higher. DeepSeek's models reduce token costs dramatically, making advanced AI more accessible and practical for business use, benefiting Microsoft's Azure services.

title: Microsoft + TikTok, 2025 edition: Trump comment stirs new speculation about possible deal
text: The potential for Microsoft to acquire TikTok is looping back around again like a viral social dance clip on endless repeat.

title: Can The Magnificent 7 Maintain An Upbeat Earnings Season?
text: The Q4 earnings season continued on a positive note after big banks and other financials struck a bullish tone in the first two weeks of reporting. Highly anticipated reports from the Magnificent 7 will be in focus over the next couple of weeks. Southwest Airlines is set to report their Q4 2024 results on Thursday, January 30, a week later than expected.

title: Microsoft, Meta, and OpenAI Have Recently Confirmed Massive AI Investments

title: Trump says Microsoft is in talks to acquire TikTok
text: President Donald Trump told reporters that Microsoft is in talks to acquire TikTok's U.S. operations, Bloomberg reports. Although Trump didn't elaborate, he stated that “there's great interest in TikTok” and that there will be “a lot of people bidding on it.

title: Big Tech's Deteriorating Earnings Quality
text: I am going to focus on three companies within Big Tech: Microsoft, Meta Platforms, and Alphabet. Microsoft's gross PP&E increased from $22 Billion in FY'2013 to $212 Billion in FY'2024. In Meta's case, we do see a somewhat noticeable mix shift within PP&E for servers and network assets, as it declined from ~45-60% in 2013-2018 period to ~38-42% in the last five years.

title: OpenAI launches ChatGPT Gov for U.S. government agencies
text: OpenAI announced its biggest product launch since its enterprise rollout. It's called ChatGPT Gov, and was built specifically for U.S. government use.

title: Microsoft Gears Up For Q2 Earnings: Will The Bullish Trend Hold?
text: Microsoft Corp MSFT heads into its second-quarter earnings report on Wednesday with bullish technical indicators but mixed sentiment from partners.

title: Mag 7 Valuations Going Into Earnings
text: It was a rough day on Monday for the Nasdaq, down 612 points or 3.1%. and for four of the seven Mag 7 stocks.

title: Microsoft's underperformance has investors looking to cloud for growth
text: Microsoft's stock has underperformed the Nasdaq and all of its megacap tech peers over the past year. The company's year-over-year Azure cloud growth has been little changed for the past few quarters, while Alphabet and Amazon have shown acceleration.

title: UK raises cloud competition concerns, names Microsoft and Amazon as dominant players
text: Britain's antitrust watchdog on Tuesday raised concerns over competition in the multi-billion-pound cloud computing market.

title: Analyst updates Microsoft stock price after being ‘spared' by DeepSeek sell-off
text: The stock market is still digesting the massive sell-off in technology equities as the emergence of the low-cost Chinese artificial intelligence (AI) model DeepSeek rattled investors.

title: Microsoft's cloud growth in focus as doubts grow over AI spending
text: Microsoft has spent months touting a rebound in its Azure cloud business and its quarterly revenue forecast on Wednesday will show whether billion-dollar bets on artificial intelligence are propelling increased growth in its main profit engine.

title: Microsoft eyeing TikTok bid, according to Trump
text: Microsoft Corp is said to be in the running to make an offer for ban-threatened TikTok, according to US president Donald Trump. Trump cited “great interest in TikTok” from a string of companies when speaking to reporters.

title: Microsoft's AI Revenue Set To Surpass $10 Billion: Piper Sandler Maintains Overweight Rating
text: Microsoft Corp. MSFT cloud computing platform Azure's workloads could push its artificial intelligence revenue to $10 billion as it is the world's largest cloud franchise with a first-mover advantage in generative AI, said Piper Sandler in its note dated Jan. 28.

title: XEQT:CA: A Poor Way For Canadians To Invest
text: Simplicity in investing has led to the rise of passive investing. iShares Core Equity ETF Portfolio, a popular Canadian fund, manages over $6.5 billion and is a fund of funds with seven underlying holdings. The fund offers broad exposure, with the bulk of its holdings outside Canada, including significant investments in US and international developed markets.
